entry.title: Monday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of thundershowers early this evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
